titleStmt.title: SII 14.86: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 86. (A.R. No. 624 of 1926.) KĪḺMĀTTŪR, MADURAI TALUK, MADURAI DISTRICT. ON THE WEST WALL OF THE MAṆIKAṆṬHĒŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This record of Vīra-Pāṇḍya is dated in the 5th year opposite to the 5th year instead of being dated opposite to the 4th year, as in the earlier records. The stones of this record are disarranged, and some portion of the document is lost. It mentions that some lands in the village called Parāntakanallūr alias Vāmadēvamaṅgalam which was situated in the subdivision Māḍakkuḷakkīḻ and which belonged to the temple were examined by some officer apparently the one figuring in another recordNo. 84 above. in the same temple, and the paddy derivable from them were fixed for the requirements of worship and offerings to the god Bhaṭāra at Tiruvāmāttūr.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.head: TEXT
div.p:
svasti śrī . coḻaṉṟalai koṇṭa kovirapāṇṭiyaṟku yāṇ nāṉku Itaṉ ṉetir Añcu . Ivvāṇṭu tirumāttūr bhaṭārarkku śrīkaṇṭuṇṭhaśvarameṉṟu tirukkaṟṟaḷi Eṭu
varkku śrī kāryyamārāyā niṉṟit tevar tevatāṉa māṭakkuḷakkīḻ śrīparāntakanallūrāyiṉa vāmatevamaṅkalaṅ koṉeri Uṭpaṭṭa Ūrā rittevarkku pāṭakkaṭa
rumuṟṟa ṭi Aḷakka kaṭava nel lannūṟemuppattaiṅkalattālum Ivakaḷe yiṭak kaṭava Uruvu poṉ maṉaṟpāri Īḻakkācu muppatiṉālum Itte
ruvamitiṉukkup patteṭṭukkuttal poti ṉāṉāḻi Ariciyāka niyatam Arici panniru nāḻiyum Aṉṉa balikkum meṟpaṭi kuttal niyatam Arici munnāḻi mūḻakkum I
ṟṟi niyatam patteṭṭuk kuttalarici patiṉeḻu nāḻiyiṉāṟ kuttal vāci Eṟṟi Arici Irupatiṉāḻi mūḻakkiṉā liraṭṭi nel loru nāḷaik keṇkuṟuṇi nāḻiya
laṉey mukkuṟuṇiyu mivattukkuk kuṟuvāḷ kūli kalattuvāyk kuṟuṇiyākak kūli nellup patiṉmukkalaṉey nāṟ kuṟuṇi Oru nāḻiyum Eṟṟit tiruvamitu Aṟa nel

div.head: Fragment A
div.p:
hattu tevaramitu ceyyum poḻutuṇṇum brāhmaṇar Aivarkku meṟpaṭi kuttalarici Eḻu nāḻi Uriyiṉāṟ kuttal maratam Eṟu marici nāḻi mūḻakke yāḻāk keṟṟic ceralarici Oṉpati ṇuḻi Uḻak kāḻākkināliraṭṭi nel varkku nellaṟupattāṟu kalamun tirumeyppūccuc cantaṉa niyatam Arai palamāka Orāṭṭai nāḷaikkuc cantaṉa nūṟṟeṇpatiṉ palattiṉukku nellu
k kācu Orāṭṭai nāḷaikku veṇṭu nellut toṇṇūṟṟuk kalamu mivaṟṟukkuk kuṟuvarai nāli nellaṟu kalamu mivakaḷukku niyata ney yuḻakkiṉukkun tayiriru nāḻi māka Īḻakkācu panniraṇṭum tiruppukaikkuk kuṅkuliya niyatam Oru palavaraiyāka Orāṭṭai nāḷaikkuk kuṅkuliyam Aññūṟṟu nāṟpatiṉ pala
ḻiyāka Eṟṟi Orāṭṭai nāḷaikkunellu nūṟṟu nāṟpattu nāṟkalamum devarkkum brāhmaṇarkkuma devar nantavaṉaṅkaḷil devar vārattilaiṅkaṟiyamitu koḷvatākavu mivarkaḷukku viṟaku nīrun tāṉey kuṟai p patiṉ palamāka Īḻakkā coṉṟaraiyum Aṭaikkāya mitiṉukku niyatam peṟuṅkāy muppatāka Orāṭṭai nāḷaikku peṟuṅkāy patiṉāyirat teṇṇūṟ ṟiṉ
rivaṉukku niyata nel laṟu nāḻiyāka Orāṭṭai nāḷaikkunel lirupatteṇkalaṉey panniru kuṟuṇiyu mivaṉukkup puṭavai mutaluk kāṭṭaivaṭṭa nellu muppatiṉ kalamum Eṟṟi nellaim patteṇ kalaṉey panniru ku y muvvāyirattaṟu nūṟāka Īḻakkācu muṉṟum Ilaiya mitukkut teriyilai niyatam mūvaṭukkāka Orāṭṭai nāḷaikku veṇṭum Ilaiyami tirunūṟ ṟeḻupa
riva rāṇṭikaṇmārkku niyata nellu mukkuṟuṇiyāka Orāṭṭai nāḷaikku nelleḻupattiru kalamum mivarkaḷiruvarkkum Āṭṭai vaṭṭap puṭavai mutalukku nellaṟupatiṉ kalam meṟṟi Aṭikaṇmāri kut teriyilai toṇṇuṟṟup paṟṟāka Īḻakkācu muṉṟum nūṟṟamitiṉukku Orāṭṭai nāḷaikku Īḻakkācaraiyum Eṟṟi nibandham Aṭaitta nel leḻunāṭuriyāka Orāṭṭai nāḷaikku
ttirukalamum śrī koyil meḻuku pat taṭikaṇmārkku niyata nellu muppattaṟu kalamum Ivarkaḷiruvarkkum Āṭṭai vaṭṭap puṭavai mutalukku nel nāḻiyum Īḻaka kācirupatum nikki niṉṟa nellu Aṟupattoru kalaṉe yirutūṇi nāṉāḻiyum Īḻakkācu pattum Ivai Āṭṭai vaṭṭamu

div.head: Fragment B
div.p: m paṅkuṉi Uttirat tiruviḻāvukkukkaṇṭaḻivākavum Ipparicu nibandham Aṭaittāṉ teṉṉavaṉ ṟamiḻveḷāyiṉakaṇṭañcāttaṉaṉā Itu panmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 14.86 (ARIE/1926-1927/B/1926/624) by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
